lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach, who was part of the United States team that won the 2015 World Cup, said she took “full responsibility” for her arrest in Portland, Ore.

headline.main: Abby Wambach Apologizes in D.U.I. Case

snippet: Abby Wambach, who was part of the United States team that won the 2015 World Cup, said she took “full responsibility” for her arrest in Portland, Ore.
abstract: Former United States soccer player Abby Wambach is arrested in Portland, Ore, for driving under influence.
